text: The men's 10,000 metres event at the 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics was held in Sydney, Australia, at International Athletic Centre on 21 August. In the race, there was a mistake in the lap counting of the judges, that caused many athletes to run 24 laps (9600 m) only. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Assefa Mezegebu ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| David Chelule ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Tetsuhiro Furuta ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 21 August {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! title: 1996 World Junior Championships in Athletics – Men's 10,000 metres
